name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kanban Boards and Tasks Shared in Google Workspace

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collaborate with your team on shared Kanban boards inside Google Workspace with Task Assignment, Due Dates, Attachments and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A curated suite of Google Workspace Tools to supercharge your productivity!

What is Kanban Tasks?

🧩 Kanban Tasks is an intuitive and shareable Kanban board directly in your Google Workspace. This natively integrated Google Chrome Extension streamlines Google Tasks management with a user-friendly Kanban Board interface which you can share with your team.

✨ NEW: Share boards with team members using our Teams subscription! Enjoy intuitive, centralized billing for your entire team.


More About Kanban Tasks

⬇️ Download and install the Kanban Tasks Extension in your Chrome browser, then log in using your Google account. Check out this How To guide (https://tooling.studio/kanban-tasks/how-to).

✨ Near-native design to help you stay focused without missing any deadlines.

📝 Create boards and lists based on your subscription plan:

Freemium: 3 boards and 3 lists
Premium: Unlimited boards and lists
Premium Plus: Everything in Premium, plus tags, attachments, and checklists
Premium Teams: All features, sharable with team members


🖱️⬇️ Drag and drop tasks for seamless task management.


📅 Add due dates to tasks, automatically reflecting in the 'Due Today' and 'Due This Week' lists in the centralized task hub, i.e., the 'Get Work Done' board.


📧 Add tasks from emails from your Gmail to the Kanban board in one click.


✍️ Add descriptions and checklists for each task - quicker and more efficient than sub-tasks for adding necessary details.*


🏃‍♂️‍➡️ Real-time sync between team members for seamless collaboration.
Pricing, Support & Data Security

🆓 Freemium plan available. Upgrade to Premium, Premium Plus, or Premium Teams for advanced features.

🔒 Your data security is prioritized with robust encryption, secure authentication, and regular security audits.

🌐📞 Efficient support via email, live chat, X, and 24/7 support through our Community Space for assistance and feedback.

Who is behind Kanban Tasks?

Kanban Tasks marks the debut product from Tooling Studio (https://tooling.studio/), a Chrome Plugin providing a suite of tools built for Google Workspace. It's all built by me, Nick Kramer (https://x.com/Nick_Kramer91), a digital entrepreneur specializing in Google Workspace enhancements.

Feature availability may vary based on your subscription plan. Please check our website for the most up-to-date information on plan features.
